mapper.select: select count(1) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id in (select user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select a.*,ifnull(b.childrenCount,0) as childrenCount, ifnull(c.allowance,0) as allowance, ifnull(d.childrenAllowance,0) as childrenAllowance, ifnull(e.newSubordinateCount,0) as newSubordinateCount, (case when a.registerTime >= #{date} then 0 else 1 end) as isRead from ( SELECT a1.user_id,a2.user_name as userName,a1.mobile,a1.head_image,a1.cfp_reg_time as registerTime from tcrm_cfplanner a1 JOIN tcrm_user_info a2 on a1.user_id=a2.user_id where a1.parent_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(1) as childrenCount, b1.user_id from tcrm_cfplanner b1,tcrm_cfplanner b2 where b1.user_id=b2.parent_id and b1.parent_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY b1.user_id ) b ON a.user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN ( select b.user_id ,sum(a.fee_amount) allowance from tcim_fee a,tcrm_cfplanner b where a.origin_cfplanner_id = b.user_id and a.profit_cfplanner_id = b.parent_id and b.parent_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.fee_type ='1002' group by b.user_id ) c ON a.user_id=c.user_id LEFT JOIN ( select b.parent_id ,sum(a.fee_amount) childrenAllowance from tcim_fee a,tcrm_cfplanner b where a.origin_cfplanner_id = b.user_id and a.profit_cfplanner_id != b.parent_id and a.profit_cfplanner_id != a.origin_cfplanner_id and a.profit_cfplanner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.fee_type ='1002' group by b.parent_id ) d ON a.user_id=d.parent_id LEFT JOIN
(select a.user_id ,count(1) newSubordinateCount from tcrm_cfplanner a,tcrm_cfplanner b where a.user_id = b.parent_id and a.parent_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cfp_reg_time > #{date} group by a.user_id) e ON a.user_id=e.user_id where 1=1
and mobile like '%${userName}%' or userName like '%${userName}%'
ORDER BY
registerTime
allowance
childrenAllowance
DESC
ASC
select min(create_time) from tcim_fee where profit_cfplanner_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and origin_cfplanner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fee_type=1002
select ifnull(sum(fee_amount),0) from tcim_fee where profit_cfplanner_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and origin_cfplanner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fee_type=1002

select ifnull(sum(fee_amount),0) from tcim_fee where profit_cfplanner_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and origin_cfplanner_id in (select user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and fee_type=1002

select p.product_name, f.product_amount ,f.create_time,f.fee_amount,f.fee_rate, (case when f.origin_cfplanner_id = tc.user_id then 1 else 2 end) as allowance_type from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcim_product p on f.product_id=p.product_id
,tcrm_cfplanner tc
where profit_cfplanner_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fee_type=1002
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (f.origin_cfplanner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or f.origin_cfplanner_id in (select user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ) order by f.id desc

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and create_time > #{date}) + (SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id in (SELECT user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and create_time > #{date})
SELECT IFNULL(sum(fee_amount),0) from tcim_fee where profit_cfplanner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fee_type='1002' and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')
SELECT IFNULL(sum(product_amount),0) from tcim_fee where profit_cfplanner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fee_type='1002' and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')
